Title: Astrophysical capabilities of a double fourier modulation interferometer in space
Abstract: © 2014 Optical Society of America.Here we present how the Far-infrared Interferometer Instrument Simulator (FIInS) is used to simulate an observation of astronomical targets. The selection of the instrument parameters (spectral and spatial) is discussed and the obtained results analyzed.
